question: List the top 5 players by average points per game, along with their team name.
sql:
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, t.team_name, AVG(gs.points) AS average_points_per_game
FROM game_stats gs
JOIN players p ON gs.player_id = p.player_id
JOIN teams t ON p.team_id = t.team_id
GROUP BY p.player_id, p.first_name, p.last_name, t.team_name
ORDER BY average_points_per_game DESC
LIMIT 5
answer:

question: Which team has the highest average points per game for their players in the 2023 season?
sql:
SELECT teams.team_name
FROM teams
JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id
JOIN game_stats ON players.player_id = game_stats.player_id
WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM game_stats.game_date) = 2023
GROUP BY teams.team_name
ORDER BY AVG(game_stats.points) DESC
LIMIT 1

question: What are the names of all teams based in Los Angeles?
sql:
SELECT team_name
FROM teams
WHERE city = 'Los Angeles'

question: Who scored the most points in a single game?
sql:
SELECT player_id, MAX(points) AS max_points
FROM game_stats

question: For each team, list the player with the highest total points in 2024.
sql:
SELECT t.team_name, p.first_name, p.last_name, SUM(gs.points) as total_points
FROM teams t
JOIN players p ON t.team_id = p.team_id
JOIN game_stats gs ON p.player_id = gs.player_id
WHERE YEAR(gs.game_date) = 2024
GROUP BY t.team_name
HAVING SUM(gs.points) = (
    SELECT SUM(points)
    FROM game_stats
    WHERE player_id = p.player_id AND YEAR(game_date) = 2024
    GROUP BY player_id
    ORDER BY SUM(points) DESC
    LIMIT 1
)
